悓字的基本解释

悓
qiàn
古同“俔”。

悓字的汉语字典释义

[①]［qiàn］
［《廣韻》苦甸切，去霰，溪。］
［《廣韻》胡典切，上銑，匣。］
“伣1”的繁体字。亦作“悓1”。
如同，好比。
[②]［xiàn］
［《廣韻》胡典切，上銑，匣。］
“伣1”的繁体字。
(1)间谍。
(2)船上用以测风的羽毛。《淮南子·齐俗训》：“辟若俔之見風也，無須臾之間定矣。”高诱注；“俔，候風者也，世所謂五兩。”《说文·人部》桂馥义证：“船上候風羽謂之俔，能諜知風信也。”一说“俔”是“綄”字形近之误。见清王念孙《读书杂志·淮南子十一》。
(3)见“俔2俔”。

悓字的康熙字典解释

【卯集上】【心字部】　悓； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页387第16
【集韻】輕甸切。與俔同。【說文】譬諭也。引《詩》俔天之妹。或从心。

悓字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
悓字的起名意思

暂无。

qiàn
Gu Tong "Ji".
Challenge
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［qiàn］
["Guangyun" bitterly cut, go to Cha, Xi. ]
["Guang Yun" Hu Dian cut, milled, box. ]
"伣1" in traditional characters. Also known as "Ring 1".
Like, like.
[②]［xiàn］
["Guang Yun" Hu Dian cut, milled, box. ]
"伣1" in traditional characters.
(1) Spy.
(2) Feathers used to measure wind on ships. "Huainanzi·Qi Suxun": "If you see the wind, there is no need to settle for a moment." Gao You's note; "You, those who wait for the wind are also the so-called five-two in the world." "Suowen·Human Department "Gui Fu's proof: "Wai Fengyu on the ship is called "Feng Yu," he can spy and know the wind." One said that "Ji" is a short form of "Qi". See Qing Wang Niansun "Reading Magazine·Huainanzi Eleventh".
(3) See "Le 2 Ni".
Challenge
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Mao Ji 1] [Heart Word Department] 　悓; Kangxi Strokes: 11; Pages: Page 387-16
【Jiyun】Cut lightly. Same as the same. [Said the text] For example. Quote "The Poetry" Li Tian's sister. Or from the heart.
